column2: The Censor is responsible for taking the census of the realm. While the office was originally instituded for taxation purposes the most important duty of the Censor is to supervise public morality and recommend suitable candidates for public offices.
An Augur is a priest and public official responsible for interpreting the will of the gods by studying the flight of birds.
The Flamen Dialis is the high priest of Jupiter.
As wife of the Flamen Dialis, the Flaminica Dialis are entrusted to performs certain religious rituals.
The Flamen Martialis is the high priest of Mars.
As wife of the Flamen Martialis, the Flaminica Martialis are entrusted to performs certain religious rituals.
The Flamen Quirinalis is the high priest of Quirinus.
As wife of the Flamen Quirinalis, the Flaminica Quirinalis are entrusted to performs certain religious rituals.

The College of the Vestales is the foremost order of priestesses of the Greco-Roman religion, each member taking a vow of chastity in order to devote themselves to the study and correct observance of religious rituals.
As the head of the College of the Vestales and the only female member of the College of Pontiffs, the Vestalis Maxima is the most important of the high priestesses of the Greco-Roman religion.
Did not establish a Greco-Roman state religion
Did not enforce a Greco-Roman state religion
Having long studied the old Greek and Roman classics you are wondering if their religious views wasn't better than your own.
Yes, the old religion was better
No, I'm secure in my faith
As the newly crowned Emperor, you have the opportunity to re-establish the old imperial state religion once again, but your Christian vasals are not likely to appreciate such a decree.
We must restore the glory of the old faith!
Parts of the Empire will convert to the old imperial state religion.
Let my vassals choose their own faith.
The newly crowed Emperor has endevored to restore the ancient faith to the Empire, and demands that you convert.
Without the Flaminica Dialis to assist you in your duties, the ancient religious laws require that you retire.
Without the Flaminica Martialis to assist you in your duties, the ancient religious laws require that you retire.
Without the Flaminica Quirinalis to assist you in your duties, the ancient religious laws require that you retire.
Having served Vesta for 30 years this character has retiered from the College of the Vestales.
Nominate [Root.GetFirstName] for 30 years of dedicated service to the goddess Vesta.
After 30 years of devoted service to Vesta the time has come for you to retire from public office.
One of your vasals has nominated a child for service to Vesta.
